headline.main: CLASH ON SHIFTING CHILDREN'S BUREAU; Pepper and Mrs. Meyer Fight Over Senator's Bill for a New Health Service She Attacks Present Program HER OWN PLAN IS OFFERED She Attacks Present Program as Wasteful and Without Real Administration
